alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Oktibbeha; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 5:44PM CDT until July 09 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... East central Webster County in north central Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 544 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mathiston, or 16 miles southwest of Montpelier, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Maben around 550 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
